Class NodeServicesOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, ManagementI, MessagingI, NodeServicesCI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class NodeServicesOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements NodeServicesCI
    The class NodeServicesOutboundPort implements the outbound port for the required interface NodeServicesCI.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-04
